verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
i look to the sky,
the sun blazing on high
has scorched the grass,
the heavens - still brass

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
let it rain, let it rain
showers of blessing
cleansing, refreshing
let it rain, let it rain
let it fall, heal us all, let it rain.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
above the dry land
a cloud like a man's hand
i now can see
brings hope to me.
